title: Wiring Systems
fullText: Wiring systems for a fountain or water feature shall be: (a) elastomer or thermoplastic insulated and sheathed copper cables or flexible cords suitable for immersion in the type of water being used; (b) where subject to mechanical damage, installed in a wiring enclosure; and (c) installed so as to prevent: (i) entry of moisture to any connection; and (ii) water siphoning through any wiring enclosure or cable.
